entry.title: A Beginner's Guide to the Strategy Design Pattern
entry.summary: The Strategy Design Pattern is a behavioral design pattern [https://shrinke.me/XNNXyxVS]. It allows you to dynamically change the behavior of an object by encapsulating it into different strategies.
